about_the_game:
Summer is hot, but it'd be hotter with a girl!

Suki is the cute girl who works at your regular café. You were able to get her contact info... somehow.

What's your first message?

Bored and all alone in the house, exchange messages with her and keep her entertained all summer long. If your texting game is good, maybe you could convince her to meet outside of work. Experience a "slice of life" story set in Kyushu, Japan!

16 missions to complete which unlock 16 cute and kawaii poses. All clothing can be removed with free controls to rotate, pan, and zoom in on Suki's body. Completing the game unlocks a bonus 17th and 18th pose!

Before buying, please try out the free demo to see if Suki turns you on! The demo includes two missions and poses.

Note: While inspired by real conversations and stories, the game as a whole is a work of fiction.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains full nudity, sexually suggestive dialogue, and occasional censored swearing.

Summer is hot, but it'd be hotter with a girl!

Suki is the cute girl who works at your regular café. You were able to get her contact info... somehow.

What's your first message?

Bored and all alone in the house, exchange messages with her and keep her entertained all summer long. If your texting game is good, maybe you could convince her to meet outside of work. Experience a "slice of life" story set in Kyushu, Japan!

16 missions to complete which unlock 16 cute and kawaii poses. All clothing can be removed with free controls to rotate, pan, and zoom in on Suki's body. Completing the game unlocks a bonus 17th and 18th pose!

Before buying, please try out the free demo to see if Suki turns you on! The demo includes two missions and poses.

Note: While inspired by real conversations and stories, the game as a whole is a work of fiction.
legal_notice: This product is for personal use only. It may not be used for any commercial or public work. It may not be redistributed in any shape or form. Sharing screenshots or gameplay videos is okay. Thank you for your cooperation!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: entry-level Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 220 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: HDD supported but longer initial load times
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit or Windows® 11
  • Processor: mid-tier Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 220 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended for faster load times

short_description: Spend your summer with Suki! Exchange text messages, complete missions, unlock poses, and fully undress her. 18 kawaii poses to unlock, and all clothing can be removed. Try out the free demo.
